plot: Bao sacrifices herself, becoming a butterfly, to save her sick fiance and discovers in the process how true their love is.
title: Jian Shang Die
plot_es: Bao sacrifices herself, becoming a butterfly, to save her sick fiance and discovers in the process how true their love is.
